00011a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;2772
00011c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;2772
00011e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;2772
                  |L15.288|
000120  4828              LDR      r0,|L15.452|
000122  f8900076          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x76]         ;2772  ; Ir
000126  f89d1000          LDRB     r1,[sp,#0]            ;2772
00012a  4288              CMP      r0,r1                 ;2772
00012c  dce8              BGT      |L15.256|
;;;2775   						}
;;;2776   				
;;;2777   
;;;2778   						Ir.flag=1;																	//表示数据装入完毕
00012e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000130  4924              LDR      r1,|L15.452|
000132  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;2779   						Ir.sendtime=SEND_TIME_MAX;									//最大发送时间
000134  f44f7016          MOV      r0,#0x258
000138  81c8              STRH     r0,[r1,#0xe]
;;;2780   						IT1_Load_RS485_Ack(OPT_OK); 
00013a  20fb              MOVS     r0,#0xfb
00013c  f7fffffe          BL       IT1_Load_RS485_Ack
;;;2781   						
;;;2782   						//============取得总包数=========
;;;2783   						Ir.FrameNum=Ir.typelen/32;
000140  4920              LDR      r1,|L15.452|
000142  7c48              LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x11]  ; Ir
000144  17c1              ASRS     r1,r0,#31
000146  eb0061d1          ADD      r1,r0,r1,LSR #27
00014a  1149              ASRS     r1,r1,#5
00014c  4a1d              LDR      r2,|L15.452|
00014e  71d1              STRB     r1,[r2,#7]
;;;2784   						tmp=Ir.typelen%32;
000150  4611              MOV      r1,r2
000152  7c48              LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x11]  ; Ir
000154  17c1              ASRS     r1,r0,#31
000156  eb0061d1          ADD      r1,r0,r1,LSR #27
00015a  1149              ASRS     r1,r1,#5
00015c  eba01141          SUB      r1,r0,r1,LSL #5
000160  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
;;;2785   						if(tmp!=0)Ir.FrameNum++;
000162  b124              CBZ      r4,|L15.366|
000164  4610              MOV      r0,r2
000166  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; Ir
000168  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00016a  4611              MOV      r1,r2
00016c  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
                  |L15.366|
;;;2786   						tmp=Ir.keylen/32;
00016e  4915              LDR      r1,|L15.452|
000170  f8910076          LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x76]  ; Ir
000174  17c1              ASRS     r1,r0,#31
000176  eb0061d1          ADD      r1,r0,r1,LSR #27
00017a  114c              ASRS     r4,r1,#5
;;;2787   						Ir.FrameNum=Ir.FrameNum+tmp;
00017c  4811              LDR      r0,|L15.452|
00017e  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; Ir
000180  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
000182  4910              LDR      r1,|L15.452|
000184  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;2788   						tmp=Ir.keylen%32;
000186  f8910076          LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x76]  ; Ir
00018a  17c1              ASRS     r1,r0,#31
00018c  eb0061d1          ADD      r1,r0,r1,LSR #27
000190  1149              ASRS     r1,r1,#5
000192  eba01141          SUB      r1,r0,r1,LSL #5
000196  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
;;;2789   						if(tmp!=0)Ir.FrameNum++;
000198  b124              CBZ      r4,|L15.420|
00019a  480a              LDR      r0,|L15.452|
00019c  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; Ir
00019e  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0001a0  4908              LDR      r1,|L15.452|
0001a2  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
                  |L15.420|
;;;2790   						if(Ir.FrameNum>15)Ir.FrameNum=15;
0001a4  4807              LDR      r0,|L15.452|
0001a6  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; Ir
0001a8  280f              CMP      r0,#0xf
0001aa  dd02              BLE      |L15.434|
0001ac  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
0001ae  4905              LDR      r1,|L15.452|
0001b0  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
                  |L15.434|
;;;2791   						Ir.serial=0;
0001b2  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0001b4  4903              LDR      r1,|L15.452|
0001b6  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;2792   						//================================
;;;2793   						
;;;2794   						IT1_IR_LoadToWireless(Ir.addr);		
0001b8  7808              LDRB     r0,[r1,#0]  ; Ir
0001ba  f7fffffe          BL       IT1_IR_LoadToWireless
;;;2795   }
0001be  bd38              POP      {r3-r5,pc}
;;;2796   
                          ENDP

                  |L15.448|
                          DCD      RxDat
                  |L15.452|
                          DCD      ||Ir||

                          AREA ||i.IT1_IR_StuLoad||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_IR_StuLoad PROC
;;;2709   //参数2: 命令
;;;2710   void IT1_IR_StuLoad(uint8_t index,uint8_t len,uint8_t *pdat)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;2711   {
000004  4607              MOV      r7,r0
000006  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000008  4690              MOV      r8,r2
;;;2712   	
;;;2713   				_Frame *ps;
;;;2714   	      uint8_t i;
;;;2715   				
;;;2716   				ps=GetQueue_InQ(&RS485_Queue,8);
00000a  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
00000c  481d              LDR      r0,|L16.132|
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       GetQueue_InQ
000012  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;2717   				//缓冲区溢出
;;;2718   				if(ps==NULL)
000014  b90c              CBNZ     r4,|L16.26|
                  |L16.22|
;;;2719   				{
;;;2720   					return;
;;;2721   				}
;;;2722   				
;;;2723   				ps->buf[0]=0x04;			//帧控制
;;;2724   				ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;2725   				ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;2726   				ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;2727   				ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;2728   				ps->buf[5]=0x80+index+1;//0x10;
;;;2729   				
;;;2730   
;;;2731   				ps->buf[6]=len;                        	   //数据长度
;;;2732   				if(len>3)len=3;
;;;2733   				for(i=0;i<len;i++)ps->buf[7+i]=*(pdat+i);
;;;2734   
;;;2735   				ps->buf[7+len]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,7+len);		//CRC8校验
;;;2736   				ps->cnt=8+len;					//发送总的字节数
;;;2737   
;;;2738   
;;;2739   				ps->flag=1;
;;;2740   				ps->resend=4;
;;;2741   				ps->rand=0;
;;;2742   				ps->ackwait=30;					//等待应答时间最大300mS
;;;2743   				EnQueueBuf(&RS485_Queue,8);
;;;2744   }
000016  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
                  |L16.26|
00001a  2004              MOVS     r0,#4                 ;2723
00001c  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;2723
00001e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;2724
000020  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;2724
000022  70a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#2]            ;2725
000024  70e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#3]            ;2726
000026  4818              LDR      r0,|L16.136|
000028  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]            ;2727  ; Dev
00002a  7120              STRB     r0,[r4,#4]            ;2727
00002c  f1070081          ADD      r0,r7,#0x81           ;2728
000030  7160              STRB     r0,[r4,#5]            ;2728
000032  71a5              STRB     r5,[r4,#6]            ;2731
000034  2d03              CMP      r5,#3                 ;2732
000036  dd00              BLE      |L16.58|
000038  2503              MOVS     r5,#3                 ;2732
                  |L16.58|
00003a  2600              MOVS     r6,#0                 ;2733
00003c  e005              B        |L16.74|
                  |L16.62|
00003e  f8181006          LDRB     r1,[r8,r6]            ;2733
000042  1df0              ADDS     r0,r6,#7              ;2733
000044  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]            ;2733
000046  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1              ;2733
000048  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0                 ;2733
                  |L16.74|
00004a  42ae              CMP      r6,r5                 ;2733
00004c  dbf7              BLT      |L16.62|
00004e  1de8              ADDS     r0,r5,#7              ;2735
000050  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0                 ;2735
000052  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;2735
000054  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
000058  1de9              ADDS     r1,r5,#7              ;2735
00005a  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]            ;2735
00005c  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;2736
00005e  f8040fc8          STRB     r0,[r4,#0xc8]!        ;2736
000062  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;2739
000064  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;2739
000066  2004              MOVS     r0,#4                 ;2740
000068  70a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#2]            ;2740
00006a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;2741
00006c  7120              STRB     r0,[r4,#4]            ;2741
00006e  201e              MOVS     r0,#0x1e              ;2742
000070  7160              STRB     r0,[r4,#5]            ;2742
000072  f1a404c8          SUB      r4,r4,#0xc8           ;2742
000076  f04f0108          MOV      r1,#8                 ;2743
00007a  4802              LDR      r0,|L16.132|
00007c  f7fffffe          BL       EnQueueBuf
000080  bf00              NOP      
000082  e7c8              B        |L16.22|
;;;2745   
                          ENDP

                  |L16.132|
                          DCD      RS485_Queue
                  |L16.136|
                          DCD      ||Dev||

                          AREA ||i.IT1_IR_UnLoadToWireless||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_IR_UnLoadToWireless PROC
;;;3003   //红外配置数据装入无线
;;;3004   void IT1_IR_UnLoadToWireless(uint8_t chl,uint8_t key,uint8_t mode)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;3005   {
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4690              MOV      r8,r2
;;;3006   						uint8_t  i;
;;;3007   						_Frame *pws;
;;;3008   
;;;3009   	          if(chl>=8)return;
00000a  2e08              CMP      r6,#8
00000c  db01              BLT      |L17.18|
                  |L17.14|
;;;3010   	
;;;3011   						pws=GetQueue_InQ(&WirelessSend_Queue,chl);	
;;;3012   					  if(pws==0)return;
;;;3013   					
;;;3014   					  Ir.wait=1;																	//
;;;3015   						
;;;3016   						pws->buf[0]=0x10;														//包长度
;;;3017   						pws->buf[1]=MTD_IR_DEL;														//包类型
;;;3018   					
;;;3019   					  //2017.11.16增加通道，修改0为chl
;;;3020   						for(i=0;i<3;i++)pws->buf[2+i]=Ex_Table.Exchange[chl].wl_addr[i]; //目标地址
;;;3021   	          pws->buf[5]=Ex_Table.Exchange[chl].channel;
;;;3022   						for(i=0;i<4;i++)pws->buf[6+i]=Ir.TgAddr[i];											//54键遥控器地址	源地址
;;;3023   						
;;;3024   					  pws->buf[10]=Ir.serial;
;;;3025   					
;;;3026   					  pws->buf[11]=mode;									  //
;;;3027   					  pws->buf[12]=key;										//键值或命令
;;;3028   					
;;;3029   						pws->buf[13]=0x00;							//高2 bit 为类型
;;;3030   						
;;;3031   						pws->buf[14]=Crc8CheckSum(pws->buf,14);
;;;3032   						pws->buf[15]=SumCheck(pws->buf,14);
;;;3033   						
;;;3034   						pws->cnt=16;				   //发送总的字节数
;;;3035   						pws->flag=1;
;;;3036   						pws->resend=1;				 //重复上报三次	
;;;3037   						pws->rand=0;				   //第一次空闲既发送
;;;3038   						pws->ackwait=0;	
;;;3039   						EnQueueBuf(&WirelessSend_Queue,chl);	
;;;3040   					}
00000e  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
                  |L17.18|
000012  4631              MOV      r1,r6                 ;3011
000014  482a              LDR      r0,|L17.192|
000016  f7fffffe          BL       GetQueue_InQ
00001a  4604              MOV      r4,r0                 ;3011
00001c  b904              CBNZ     r4,|L17.32|
00001e  e7f6              B        |L17.14|
                  |L17.32|
000020  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;3014
000022  4928              LDR      r1,|L17.196|
000024  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]            ;3014
000026  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10              ;3016
000028  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;3016
00002a  2044              MOVS     r0,#0x44              ;3017
00002c  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;3017
00002e  2500              MOVS     r5,#0                 ;3020
000030  e00a              B        |L17.72|
                  |L17.50|
000032  ebc601c6          RSB      r1,r6,r6,LSL #3       ;3020
000036  4824              LDR      r0,|L17.200|
000038  eb000041          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #1       ;3020
00003c  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3              ;3020
00003e  5d41              LDRB     r1,[r0,r5]            ;3020
000040  1ca8              ADDS     r0,r5,#2              ;3020
000042  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]            ;3020
000044  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;3020
000046  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;3020
                  |L17.72|
000048  2d03              CMP      r5,#3                 ;3020
00004a  dbf2              BLT      |L17.50|
00004c  ebc601c6          RSB      r1,r6,r6,LSL #3       ;3021
000050  481d              LDR      r0,|L17.200|
000052  eb000041          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #1       ;3021
000056  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]            ;3021
000058  7160              STRB     r0,[r4,#5]            ;3021
00005a  2500              MOVS     r5,#0                 ;3022
00005c  e006              B        |L17.108|
                  |L17.94|
00005e  4819              LDR      r0,|L17.196|
000060  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3              ;3022
000062  5d41              LDRB     r1,[r0,r5]            ;3022
000064  1da8              ADDS     r0,r5,#6              ;3022
000066  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]            ;3022
000068  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;3022
00006a  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;3022
                  |L17.108|
00006c  2d04              CMP      r5,#4                 ;3022
00006e  dbf6              BLT      |L17.94|
000070  4814              LDR      r0,|L17.196|
000072  7a00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#8]            ;3024  ; Ir
000074  72a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0xa]          ;3024
000076  f884800b          STRB     r8,[r4,#0xb]          ;3026
00007a  7327              STRB     r7,[r4,#0xc]          ;3027
00007c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;3029
00007e  7360              STRB     r0,[r4,#0xd]          ;3029
000080  210e              MOVS     r1,#0xe               ;3031
000082  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;3031
000084  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
000088  73a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0xe]          ;3031
00008a  210e              MOVS     r1,#0xe               ;3032
00008c  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;3032
00008e  f7fffffe          BL       SumCheck
000092  f10404ae          ADD      r4,r4,#0xae           ;3032
000096  f8040c9f          STRB     r0,[r4,#-0x9f]        ;3032
00009a  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10              ;3034
00009e  76a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1a]         ;3034
0000a0  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;3035
0000a4  76e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1b]         ;3035
0000a6  7720              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1c]         ;3036
0000a8  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0                 ;3037
0000ac  77a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1e]         ;3037
0000ae  77e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1f]         ;3038
0000b0  f1a404ae          SUB      r4,r4,#0xae           ;3038
0000b4  4631              MOV      r1,r6                 ;3039
0000b6  4802              LDR      r0,|L17.192|
0000b8  f7fffffe          BL       EnQueueBuf
0000bc  bf00              NOP      
0000be  e7a6              B        |L17.14|
;;;3041   //=====================================================================================================
                          ENDP

                  |L17.192|
                          DCD      WirelessSend_Queue
                  |L17.196|
                          DCD      ||Ir||
                  |L17.200|

                          AREA ||i.IT1_IrDel_Report||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_IrDel_Report PROC
;;;2878   //红外配置完成后，向PC发送配置情况,如果无线部分失败，则数据全部填充0xff
;;;2879   void IT1_IrDel_Report(uint8_t index)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;2880   {
000002  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;2881   				_Frame *ps;
;;;2882   				
;;;2883   				ps=GetQueue_InQ(&RS485_Queue,8);
000004  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000006  481c              LDR      r0,|L18.120|
000008  f7fffffe          BL       GetQueue_InQ
00000c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;2884   				if(ps==NULL)
00000e  b904              CBNZ     r4,|L18.18|
                  |L18.16|
;;;2885   				{
;;;2886   					return;
;;;2887   				}
;;;2888   				
;;;2889   				ps->buf[0]=0x26;							//
;;;2890   				ps->buf[1]=0x00;  						//
;;;2891   				ps->buf[2]=0x00;							//
;;;2892   				ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;2893   				ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;2894   				ps->buf[5]=0x80+index+1;;		
;;;2895   
;;;2896   				ps->buf[6]=0x03;						//总的数据长度,在后面重新计算
;;;2897   				ps->buf[7]=0x01;						//删除	
;;;2898   				ps->buf[8]=Ir.cmd_key;
;;;2899   				ps->buf[9]=0x00;
;;;2900   				ps->buf[10]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,10);		//CRC8??
;;;2901   				ps->cnt=11;	
;;;2902   
;;;2903   				ps->flag=1;
;;;2904   				ps->resend=2;
;;;2905   				//ps->rand=100;
;;;2906   				ps->ackwait=30;					//
;;;2907   				EnQueueBuf(&RS485_Queue,8);
;;;2908   }
000010  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L18.18|
000012  2026              MOVS     r0,#0x26              ;2889
000014  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;2889
000016  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;2890
000018  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;2890
00001a  70a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#2]            ;2891
00001c  70e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#3]            ;2892
00001e  4817              LDR      r0,|L18.124|
000020  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]            ;2893  ; Dev
000022  7120              STRB     r0,[r4,#4]            ;2893
000024  f1050081          ADD      r0,r5,#0x81           ;2894
000028  7160              STRB     r0,[r4,#5]            ;2894
00002a  2003              MOVS     r0,#3                 ;2896
00002c  71a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#6]            ;2896
00002e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;2897
000030  71e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#7]            ;2897
000032  4813              LDR      r0,|L18.128|
000034  7a40              LDRB     r0,[r0,#9]            ;2898  ; Ir
000036  7220              STRB     r0,[r4,#8]            ;2898
000038  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;2899
00003a  7260              STRB     r0,[r4,#9]            ;2899
00003c  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa               ;2900
00003e  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;2900
000040  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
000044  f10404ae          ADD      r4,r4,#0xae           ;2900
000048  f8040ca4          STRB     r0,[r4,#-0xa4]        ;2900
00004c  f04f000b          MOV      r0,#0xb               ;2901
000050  76a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1a]         ;2901
000052  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;2903
000056  76e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1b]         ;2903
000058  f04f0002          MOV      r0,#2                 ;2904
00005c  7720              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1c]         ;2904
00005e  f04f001e          MOV      r0,#0x1e              ;2906
000062  77e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1f]         ;2906
000064  f1a404ae          SUB      r4,r4,#0xae           ;2906
000068  f04f0108          MOV      r1,#8                 ;2907
00006c  4802              LDR      r0,|L18.120|
00006e  f7fffffe          BL       EnQueueBuf
000072  bf00              NOP      
000074  e7cc              B        |L18.16|
;;;2909   
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L18.120|

                  |L18.124|

                          AREA ||i.IT1_IrSetup_Report||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_IrSetup_Report PROC
;;;2824   //红外配置完成后，向PC发送配置情况,如果无线部分失败，则数据全部填充0xff
;;;2825   void IT1_IrSetup_Report(uint8_t st)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;2826   {
000002  4606              MOV      r6,r0
;;;2827   				uint8_t i;
;;;2828   				_Frame *ps;
;;;2829   				
;;;2830   				ps=GetQueue_InQ(&RS485_Queue,8);
000004  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000006  4841              LDR      r0,|L19.268|
000008  f7fffffe          BL       GetQueue_InQ
00000c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;2831   				if(ps==NULL)
00000e  b904              CBNZ     r4,|L19.18|
                  |L19.16|
;;;2832   				{
;;;2833   					return;
;;;2834   				}
;;;2835   				
;;;2836   				ps->buf[0]=0x06;							//
;;;2837   				ps->buf[1]=0x00;  						//
;;;2838   				ps->buf[2]=0x00;							//
;;;2839   				ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;2840   				ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;2841   				ps->buf[5]=0x10;		
;;;2842   
;;;2843   				if(st==OPT_ERR)
;;;2844   				{
;;;2845   							ps->buf[6]=0;						//数据长度
;;;2846   							ps->buf[7]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,7);		//CRC8??
;;;2847   							ps->cnt=8;			
;;;2848   				}
;;;2849   				else
;;;2850   				{
;;;2851   							ps->buf[6]=2+Ir.typelen+Ir.keylen+2;						//总的数据长度,在后面重新计算
;;;2852   							ps->buf[7]=Ir.cmd_key;
;;;2853   	            ps->buf[8]=Ir.key_mode;
;;;2854   					    ps->buf[9]=Ir.typelen;
;;;2855   					    for(i=0;i<Ir.typelen;i++)
;;;2856   							{
;;;2857   										ps->buf[10+i]=Ir.typebuf[i];
;;;2858   							}
;;;2859   							ps->buf[10+Ir.typelen]=Ir.keylen;
;;;2860   							for(i=0;i<Ir.keylen;i++)
;;;2861   							{
;;;2862   										ps->buf[10+Ir.typelen+1+i]=Ir.keybuf[i];
;;;2863   							}
;;;2864   							ps->buf[10+Ir.typelen+1+Ir.keylen]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,10+Ir.typelen+1+Ir.keylen);		//CRC8??
;;;2865   							ps->cnt=10+Ir.typelen+Ir.keylen+1+1;	
;;;2866   				}
;;;2867   				
;;;2868   		
;;;2869   				
;;;2870   				ps->flag=1;
;;;2871   				ps->resend=4;
;;;2872   				//ps->rand=100;
;;;2873   				ps->ackwait=30;					//
;;;2874   				EnQueueBuf(&RS485_Queue,8);
;;;2875   }
000010  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L19.18|
000012  2006              MOVS     r0,#6                 ;2836
000014  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;2836
000016  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;2837
000018  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;2837
00001a  70a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#2]            ;2838
00001c  70e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#3]            ;2839
00001e  483c              LDR      r0,|L19.272|
000020  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]            ;2840  ; Dev
000022  7120              STRB     r0,[r4,#4]            ;2840
000024  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10              ;2841
000026  7160              STRB     r0,[r4,#5]            ;2841
000028  2efc              CMP      r6,#0xfc              ;2843
00002a  d10a              BNE      |L19.66|

;;;1595   //参数2: 命令

000000  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;1597   {
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0

00003e  28f9              CMP      r0,#0xf9
000040  d00d              BEQ      |L20.94|
;;;1606   				  ||(Ex_Table.Exchange[index].type==EX_KEY_SCENE1)||(Ex_Table.Exchange[index].type==EX_KEY_NORMAL1))
000042  ebc601c6          RSB      r1,r6,r6,LSL #3
000046  4852              LDR      r0,|L20.400|
000048  f8100011          LDRB     r0,[r0,r1,LSL #1]
00004c  28f5              CMP      r0,#0xf5
00004e  d006              BEQ      |L20.94|
000050  ebc601c6          RSB      r1,r6,r6,LSL #3
000054  484e              LDR      r0,|L20.400|
000056  f8100011          LDRB     r0,[r0,r1,LSL #1]
00005a  28f8              CMP      r0,#0xf8
00005c  d11e              BNE      |L20.156|
                  |L20.94|
;;;1607   				  
;;;1608   				{
;;;1609   						if(cmd>0)cmd=cmd-1;

000060  dd01              BLE      |L20.102|
000062  1e60              SUBS     r0,r4,#1
000064  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
                  |L20.102|
;;;1610   						lin=cmd/8;
000066  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000068  17e1              ASRS     r1,r4,#31
00006a  eb047151          ADD      r1,r4,r1,LSR #29
00006e  f3c107c7          UBFX     r7,r1,#3,#8
;;;1611   						row=cmd%8;
000072  17e1              ASRS     r1,r4,#31
000074  eb047151          ADD      r1,r4,r1,LSR #29
000078  10c9              ASRS     r1,r1,#3

00007e  f00108ff          AND      r8,r1,#0xff
;;;1612   						if((Pannel.item[index].onoffbuf[lin]&(0x01<<row))==0x00)return;

000096  d101              BNE      |L20.156|

;;;1613   				}
;;;1614   				//如果是通用遥控器

;;;1659   					return;
;;;1660   				}
;;;1661   				
;;;1662   				ps->buf[0]=0x04;			//帧控制
;;;1663   				ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H

;;;1665   				ps->buf[3]=0x00;

;;;1668   				
;;;1669   
;;;1670   				ps->buf[6]=2;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1671   				ps->buf[7]=cmd+1;													//键值
;;;1672   				ps->buf[8]=dat;												  //模式
;;;1673   
;;;1674   				ps->buf[9]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,9);		//CRC8校验
;;;1675   				ps->cnt=10;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1676   
;;;1677   
;;;1678   				ps->flag=1;
;;;1679   				ps->resend=4;
;;;1680   				ps->rand=0;
;;;1681   				ps->ackwait=30;					//等待应答时间最大300mS
;;;1682   				EnQueueBuf(&RS485_Queue,index);
;;;1683   }
000098  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
                  |L20.156|

                          AREA ||i.IT1_Key_Handle||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  IT1_Key_Handle PROC
;;;100    //按键处理
;;;101    void IT1_Key_Handle(void)
000000  4770              BX       lr
;;;102    {
;;;103    //	#if 0
;;;104    //      uint8_t ucKeyCode;
;;;105    //	    uint8_t index,key_value;//,i;
;;;106    //	
;;;107    //	    if(Dev.power_time<5)return; 
;;;108    //	
;;;109    //		ucKeyCode = bsp_GetKey();	/* 读取键值, 无键按下时返回 KEY_NONE = 0 */
;;;110    
;;;111    //    if (ucKeyCode != KEY_NONE)
;;;112    //		{
;;;113    //			//================================================================================
;;;114    //			index=(ucKeyCode-1)/3;							//按键通道0~7					
;;;115    //			key_value=(ucKeyCode-1)%3;					//按键值0-压下，1-弹起，2-长按	
;;;116    //			//非设置状态
;;;117    //			if(Dev.stu<=DEV_NORMAL)
;;;118    //			{			
;;;119    //						//==========================================================================
;;;120    //				    //面板按键
;;;121    //						if(index<KEY_NUM)
;;;122    //						{
;;;123    //								//非长按键弹起,需要判断单击或双击
;;;124    //								if((key_value==1)&&(Pannel[index].key_old!=2))
;;;125    //								{
;;;126    //									  Pannel[index].key_old=key_value;
;;;127    //									  //Pannel[index].key_times=50;
;;;128    //									  //Pannel[index].key_cnt++;
;;;129    //                    IT1_RS485_DataLoad(index,S_CLICK,0);
;;;130    //								}
;;;131    //								//长按键，查表判断是否有数据要发送
;;;132    //								else if(key_value==2)
;;;133    //								{
;;;134    //									  //Pannel[index].key_cnt=0;
;;;135    //									  //Pannel[index].key_times=0;
;;;136    //									  Pannel[index].key_old=key_value;
;;;137    //									  IT1_RS485_DataLoad(index,L_KEYDOWN,0);
;;;138    //								}
;;;139    //								//长按键弹起，查表判断是否有数据发送
;;;140    //								else if((key_value==1)&&(Pannel[index].key_old==2))
;;;141    //								{
;;;142    //									  //Pannel[index].key_cnt=0;
;;;143    //									  //Pannel[index].key_times=0;
;;;144    //									  Pannel[index].key_old=key_value;
;;;145    //									  IT1_RS485_DataLoad(index,L_KEYUP,0);
;;;146    //								}
;;;147    //									
;;;148    //								//短按键按下和其他情况
;;;149    //								else 
;;;150    //								{
;;;151    //									  Pannel[index].key_old=key_value;
;;;152    //									
;;;153    //									  Led_Disp(10,5);
;;;154    //								}	
;;;155    //						}
;;;156    //						//以下为设置按键处理
;;;157    //		        else
;;;158    //						{
;;;159    //								if((ucKeyCode==KEY_SETUP_LONG)&&(Dev.stu==DEV_NORMAL))
;;;160    //								{
;;;161    //											Dev.stu=DEV_SETUP;				//进入设置键
;;;162    //									    Dev.encode_time=8;
;;;163    //									    encode_index=0;
;;;164    //									    Led_Disp(50,1);
;;;165    //								}
;;;166    //						}
;;;167    //			 }
;;;168    //			 //==============================================================================
;;;169    //			 //设置状态
;;;170    //			 else
;;;171    //			 {
;;;172    //						LedMode_SetForKey(index,key_value);
;;;173    //		   }
;;;174    //		 }
;;;175    //	#endif
;;;176    }
;;;177    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.IT1_Learn54Key||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_Learn54Key PROC
;;;3131   //进入学习54键遥控器
;;;3132   void IT1_Learn54Key(void)
000000  b508              PUSH     {r3,lr}
;;;3133   {
;;;3134   				Dev.stu=DEV_SETUP;
000002  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
000004  490c              LDR      r1,|L22.56|
000006  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;3135   				Dev.learn_time=LEARN_TIME_MAX;
000008  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
00000a  72c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xb]
;;;3136   				Dev.encode_time=0;
00000c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00000e  7308              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xc]
;;;3137   
;;;3138   				//不要求无线发送，只等待遥控器发送
;;;3139   				Exchangebuf.type= EX_KEY_54KEY;                                    //设备类型
000010  20fa              MOVS     r0,#0xfa
000012  490a              LDR      r1,|L22.60|
000014  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;3140   				Exchangebuf.addr= 0;;
000016  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000018  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;3141   				Exchangebuf.channel=0;
00001a  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;3142   				Exchangebuf.wl_addr[0]=	0;				                  			//等待接收遥控器的地址
00001c  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;3143   				Exchangebuf.wl_addr[1]= 0;  		                      		//
00001e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000020  4806              LDR      r0,|L22.60|
000022  7101              STRB     r1,[r0,#4]
;;;3144   				Exchangebuf.wl_addr[2]= 0;  
000024  7141              STRB     r1,[r0,#5]
;;;3145   
;;;3146   				Led_set(1,0xff,1,0xff,2);	
000026  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000028  23ff              MOVS     r3,#0xff
00002a  2201              MOVS     r2,#1
00002c  4619              MOV      r1,r3
00002e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000030  4610              MOV      r0,r2
000032  f7fffffe          BL       Led_set
;;;3147   }
000036  bd08              POP      {r3,pc}
;;;3148   //================================================================================================
                          ENDP

                  |L22.56|
                          DCD      ||Dev||
                  |L22.60|
                          DCD      Exchangebuf

                          AREA ||i.IT1_LearnLock||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_LearnLock PROC
;;;3149   //进入学习锁
;;;3150   void IT1_LearnLock(void)
000000  b508              PUSH     {r3,lr}
;;;3151   {
;;;3152   				//uint8_t i;
;;;3153   				Dev.stu=DEV_SETUP;
000002  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
000004  4908              LDR      r1,|L23.40|
000006  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;3154   				Dev.learn_time=LEARN_TIME_MAX;
000008  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
00000a  72c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xb]
;;;3155   				Dev.encode_time=0;
00000c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00000e  7308              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xc]
;;;3156   
;;;3157   				//不要求无线发送，只等待遥控器发送
;;;3158   
;;;3159   				lock.index=0;
000010  4906              LDR      r1,|L23.44|
000012  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;3160   	
;;;3161   				Led_set(1,0xff,1,0xff,2);	
000014  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000016  23ff              MOVS     r3,#0xff
000018  2201              MOVS     r2,#1
00001a  4619              MOV      r1,r3
00001c  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00001e  4610              MOV      r0,r2
000020  f7fffffe          BL       Led_set
;;;3162   }
000024  bd08              POP      {r3,pc}
;;;3163   
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L23.40|
                          DCD      ||Dev||
                  |L23.44|
                          DCD      lock

                          AREA ||i.IT1_LoadInfo_Report||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_LoadInfo_Report PROC
;;;2663   //装入上报信息
;;;2664   void IT1_LoadInfo_Report(void)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;2665   {
;;;2666   	uint8_t i;
;;;2667   	_Frame *ps;
;;;2668   	
;;;2669   	ps=GetQueue_InQ(&RS485_Queue,8);
000002  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000004  4831              LDR      r0,|L24.204|
000006  f7fffffe          BL       GetQueue_InQ
00000a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;2670   	if(ps==NULL)
00000c  b904              CBNZ     r4,|L24.16|
                  |L24.14|
;;;2671   	{
;;;2672   		return;
;;;2673   	}
;;;2674   	
;;;2675   	ps->buf[0]=0x20;							//???
;;;2676   	ps->buf[1]=0x00;  						//????H
;;;2677   	ps->buf[2]=0x00;							//????L
;;;2678   	ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;2679   	ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;2680   	
;;;2681   	ps->buf[5]=0x10;							//???
;;;2682   	ps->buf[6]=DEV_INFO_NUM+1;
;;;2683   	ps->buf[7]=0x00;
;;;2684   	if((Dev.type&0xff00)==0x3200)
;;;2685   	{
;;;2686   				for(i=0;i<DEV_INFO_NUM;i++)ps->buf[8+i]=DEV_INFO[i];
;;;2687   	}
;;;2688   	else if((Dev.type&0xf000)==0xb000)
;;;2689   	{
;;;2690   				for(i=0;i<DEV_INFO_NUM;i++)ps->buf[8+i]=DEV_INFO_1[i];
;;;2691   	}
;;;2692   	else
;;;2693   	{
;;;2694   		    for(i=0;i<DEV_INFO_NUM;i++)ps->buf[8+i]=DEV_INFO_2[i];
;;;2695   	}
;;;2696   	ps->buf[8+DEV_INFO_NUM]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,8+DEV_INFO_NUM);		//CRC8??
;;;2697   	ps->cnt=9+DEV_INFO_NUM;					                 //???????
;;;2698   	
;;;2699   	ps->flag=1;
;;;2700   	ps->resend=4;
;;;2701   	//ps->rand=100;
;;;2702   	ps->ackwait=30;					//
;;;2703   	EnQueueBuf(&RS485_Queue,8);
;;;2704   }
00000e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L24.16|
000010  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20              ;2675
000012  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;2675
000014  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;2676
000016  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;2676
000018  70a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#2]            ;2677
00001a  70e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#3]            ;2678
00001c  482c              LDR      r0,|L24.208|
00001e  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]            ;2679  ; Dev
000020  7120              STRB     r0,[r4,#4]            ;2679
000022  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10              ;2681
000024  7160              STRB     r0,[r4,#5]            ;2681
000026  2016              MOVS     r0,#0x16              ;2682
000028  71a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#6]            ;2682
00002a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;2683
00002c  71e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#7]            ;2683
00002e  4828              LDR      r0,|L24.208|
000030  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]            ;2684  ; Dev
000032  f400407f          AND      r0,r0,#0xff00         ;2684
000036  f5b05f48          CMP      r0,#0x3200            ;2684
00003a  d10b              BNE      |L24.84|
00003c  2500              MOVS     r5,#0                 ;2686
00003e  e006              B        |L24.78|
                  |L24.64|
000040  4824              LDR      r0,|L24.212|
000042  5d41              LDRB     r1,[r0,r5]            ;2686
000044  f1050008          ADD      r0,r5,#8              ;2686
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]            ;2686
00004a  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;2686
00004c  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;2686
                  |L24.78|
00004e  2d15              CMP      r5,#0x15              ;2686
000050  dbf6              BLT      |L24.64|
000052  e01d              B        |L24.144|
                  |L24.84|
000054  481e              LDR      r0,|L24.208|
000056  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]            ;2688  ; Dev
000058  f4004070          AND      r0,r0,#0xf000         ;2688
00005c  f5b04f30          CMP      r0,#0xb000            ;2688
000060  d10b              BNE      |L24.122|
000062  2500              MOVS     r5,#0                 ;2690
000064  e006              B        |L24.116|
                  |L24.102|
000066  481c              LDR      r0,|L24.216|
000068  5d41              LDRB     r1,[r0,r5]            ;2690
00006a  f1050008          ADD      r0,r5,#8              ;2690
00006e  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]            ;2690
000070  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;2690
000072  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;2690
                  |L24.116|
000074  2d15              CMP      r5,#0x15              ;2690
000076  dbf6              BLT      |L24.102|
000078  e00a              B        |L24.144|
                  |L24.122|
00007a  2500              MOVS     r5,#0                 ;2694
00007c  e006              B        |L24.140|
                  |L24.126|
00007e  4817              LDR      r0,|L24.220|
000080  5d41              LDRB     r1,[r0,r5]            ;2694
000082  f1050008          ADD      r0,r5,#8              ;2694
000086  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]            ;2694
000088  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;2694
00008a  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;2694
                  |L24.140|
00008c  2d15              CMP      r5,#0x15              ;2694
00008e  dbf6              BLT      |L24.126|
                  |L24.144|
000090  211d              MOVS     r1,#0x1d              ;2696
000092  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;2696
000094  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
000098  f10404ae          ADD      r4,r4,#0xae           ;2696
00009c  f8040c91          STRB     r0,[r4,#-0x91]        ;2696
0000a0  f04f001e          MOV      r0,#0x1e              ;2697
0000a4  76a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1a]         ;2697
0000a6  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;2699
0000aa  76e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1b]         ;2699
0000ac  f04f0004          MOV      r0,#4                 ;2700
0000b0  7720              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1c]         ;2700
0000b2  f04f001e          MOV      r0,#0x1e              ;2702
0000b6  77e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1f]         ;2702
0000b8  f1a404ae          SUB      r4,r4,#0xae           ;2702
0000bc  f04f0108          MOV      r1,#8                 ;2703
0000c0  4802              LDR      r0,|L24.204|
0000c2  f7fffffe          BL       EnQueueBuf
0000c6  bf00              NOP      
0000c8  e7a1              B        |L24.14|
;;;2705   //============================================================================================================
                          ENDP

0000ca  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L24.204|
                          DCD      RS485_Queue
                  |L24.208|
                          DCD      ||Dev||
                  |L24.212|
                          DCD      DEV_INFO
                  |L24.216|
                          DCD      DEV_INFO_1
                  |L24.220|
                          DCD      DEV_INFO_2

                          AREA ||i.IT1_Load_RS485_Ack||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_Load_RS485_Ack PROC
;;;1516   //RS485命令应答
;;;1517   void IT1_Load_RS485_Ack(unsigned char st)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1518   {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1519   
;;;1520   	TxDat.buf[0]=0x03;														//帧控制-应答报文
000004  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
000006  491c              LDR      r1,|L25.120|
000008  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;1521   	TxDat.buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;			//目标地址H
00000a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00000c  481a              LDR      r0,|L25.120|
00000e  7101              STRB     r1,[r0,#4]
;;;1522   	TxDat.buf[2]=Master_Address;									//目标地址L
000010  7141              STRB     r1,[r0,#5]
;;;1523   
;;;1524     TxDat.buf[3]=0X00;														//帧序列号
000012  7181              STRB     r1,[r0,#6]
;;;1525   
;;;1526   	TxDat.buf[4]=RxDat.buf[2];										//网络ID
000014  4819              LDR      r0,|L25.124|
000016  7901              LDRB     r1,[r0,#4]
000018  4817              LDR      r0,|L25.120|
00001a  71c1              STRB     r1,[r0,#7]
;;;1527   	
;;;1528   			if((st==OPT_OK)||(st==RE_OK))							//错误应答
00001c  2cfb              CMP      r4,#0xfb
00001e  d001              BEQ      |L25.36|
000020  2cfe              CMP      r4,#0xfe
000022  d10f              BNE      |L25.68|
                  |L25.36|
;;;1529   			{
;;;1530   					TxDat.buf[5]=0x20;		
000024  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
000026  4814              LDR      r0,|L25.120|
000028  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;1531   					TxDat.buf[6]=0x00;														//数据个数
00002a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00002c  7241              STRB     r1,[r0,#9]
;;;1532   					TxDat.buf[7]=Crc8CheckSum(TxDat.buf,7);				//CRC8校验
00002e  2107              MOVS     r1,#7
000030  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3
000032  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
000036  4910              LDR      r1,|L25.120|
000038  7288              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xa]
;;;1533   					TxDat.cnt=8;																	//发送总的字节数
00003a  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
00003c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1534   					TxDat.f_tx=1;		
00003e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000040  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
000042  e017              B        |L25.116|
                  |L25.68|
;;;1535   			}
;;;1536   			else								//正常应答
;;;1537   			{
;;;1538   				TxDat.buf[5]=0x20;						//网络控制命令
000044  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
000046  480c              LDR      r0,|L25.120|
000048  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;1539   				TxDat.buf[6]=0x01;	
00004a  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00004c  7241              STRB     r1,[r0,#9]
;;;1540   				if(st==OPT_ERR_SETUP)TxDat.buf[7]=0xf3;	
00004e  2cf9              CMP      r4,#0xf9
000050  d102              BNE      |L25.88|
000052  21f3              MOVS     r1,#0xf3
000054  7281              STRB     r1,[r0,#0xa]
000056  e002              B        |L25.94|
                  |L25.88|
;;;1541   				else                 TxDat.buf[7]=0xf1;	
000058  21f1              MOVS     r1,#0xf1
00005a  4807              LDR      r0,|L25.120|
00005c  7281              STRB     r1,[r0,#0xa]
                  |L25.94|
;;;1542   				TxDat.buf[8]=Crc8CheckSum(TxDat.buf,8);				//CRC8校验
00005e  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000060  4805              LDR      r0,|L25.120|
000062  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3
000064  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
000068  4903              LDR      r1,|L25.120|
00006a  72c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xb]
;;;1543   				TxDat.cnt=9;																	//发送总的字节数
00006c  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
00006e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1544   				TxDat.f_tx=1;					
000070  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000072  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
                  |L25.116|
;;;1545   			}
;;;1546   }
000074  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1547   
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L25.120|
                          DCD      TxDat
                  |L25.124|
                          DCD      RxDat

                          AREA ||i.IT1_Load_RS485_InfoReport||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_Load_RS485_InfoReport PROC
;;;1551   //从机:0x06 + 0x0000 + 0xXX + Addr + 0xXX（设备总数）+ 数据长度+ 数据 + CRC
;;;1552   void IT1_Load_RS485_InfoReport(void)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1553   {
;;;1554   		_Frame *ps;
;;;1555   	  uint8_t i;	
;;;1556   	  uint8_t *p;
;;;1557   	
;;;1558   		ps=GetQueue_InQ(&RS485_Queue,8);
000002  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000004  481c              LDR      r0,|L26.120|
000006  f7fffffe          BL       GetQueue_InQ
00000a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1559   		//缓冲区溢出
;;;1560   		if(ps==NULL)
00000c  b904              CBNZ     r4,|L26.16|
                  |L26.14|
;;;1561   		{
;;;1562   			return;
;;;1563   		}
;;;1564   		
;;;1565   		ps->buf[0]=0x06;			//帧控制
;;;1566   		ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;1567   		ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;1568   		ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;1569   		ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;1570   		ps->buf[5]=0x88;		//通道号
;;;1571   		ps->buf[6]=0x08;						//数据长度
;;;1572   		
;;;1573   		//2016.5.12修改
;;;1574   		//for(i=0;i<8;i++)ps->buf[7+i]=(uint8_t)(IT_INFO[i]);								//产品信息
;;;1575   		p=(uint8_t*)0x0800fc00;
;;;1576   		for(i=0;i<8;i++)
;;;1577   		{
;;;1578   				ps->buf[7+i]=p[i];
;;;1579   		}
;;;1580   		
;;;1581   		ps->buf[15]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,15);		//CRC8校验
;;;1582   		ps->cnt=16;					                 //发送总的字节数
;;;1583   		
;;;1584   		ps->flag=1;
;;;1585   		ps->resend=4;
;;;1586   		//ps->rand=100;
;;;1587   		ps->ackwait=30;					//等待应答时间最大300mS
;;;1588   		EnQueueBuf(&RS485_Queue,8);
;;;1589   }
00000e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L26.16|
000010  2006              MOVS     r0,#6                 ;1565
000012  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;1565
000014  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;1566
000016  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;1566

                  |L26.120|
                          DCD      RS485_Queue
                  |L26.124|
                          DCD      ||Dev||
                  |L26.128|
                          DCD      0x0800fc00

                          AREA ||i.IT1_Lock_DataLoad||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_Lock_DataLoad PROC
;;;1798   //分为状态上报和报警功能上报
;;;1799   void IT1_Lock_DataLoad(uint8_t index,uint8_t type,uint8_t dat)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1800   {
000004  4680              MOV      r8,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1801   
;;;1802   				_Frame *ps;
;;;1803   				uint8_t i;
;;;1804   				//=====================================================================================================
;;;1805   				
;;;1806   				ps=GetQueue_InQ(&RS485_Queue,index);
00000a  4641              MOV      r1,r8
00000c  4873              LDR      r0,|L27.476|
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       GetQueue_InQ
000012  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1807   				//缓冲区溢出
;;;1808   				if(ps==NULL){return;}
000014  b90c              CBNZ     r4,|L27.26|
                  |L27.22|
;;;1809   				
;;;1810   				//锁触发命令
;;;1811   				if(type==0x00)
;;;1812   				{
;;;1813   //						ps->buf[0]=0x24;			//帧控制
;;;1814   //						ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;1815   //						ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;1816   //						ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;1817   //						ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;1818   //						ps->buf[5]=index;		//通道号	
;;;1819   //						ps->buf[6]=9;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1820   //						ps->buf[7]=dat;												  //键值
;;;1821   //						for(i=0;i<8;i++)ps->buf[8+i]=lock.randkey[i];												//模式，这里默认为单击
;;;1822   //						ps->buf[16]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,16);		//CRC8校验
;;;1823   //						ps->cnt=17;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1824   //						lock.report=1;
;;;1825   					
;;;1826   						ps->buf[0]=0x24;			//帧控制
;;;1827   						ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;1828   						ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;1829   						ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;1830   						ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;1831   						ps->buf[5]=0x10+index;		//通道号	
;;;1832   						ps->buf[6]=0x03;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1833   					  ps->buf[7]=0x01; 
;;;1834   						ps->buf[8]=0x00; 
;;;1835   						ps->buf[9]=dat;												  //键值
;;;1836   						ps->buf[10]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,10);		//CRC8校验
;;;1837   						ps->cnt=11;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1838   						lock.report=1;
;;;1839   				}
;;;1840   				//锁状态上报
;;;1841   				else if(type==0x01)
;;;1842   				{			
;;;1843   						ps->buf[0]=0x04;			//帧控制
;;;1844   						ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;1845   						ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;1846   						ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;1847   						ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;1848   						ps->buf[5]=index;		//通道号	
;;;1849   						ps->buf[6]=9;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1850   						ps->buf[7]=dat;												  //键值
;;;1851   						for(i=0;i<8;i++)ps->buf[8+i]=lock.randkey[i];												//模式，这里默认为单击
;;;1852   						ps->buf[16]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,16);		//CRC8校验
;;;1853   						ps->cnt=17;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1854   					  lock.report=1;
;;;1855   					
;;;1856   					  if((dat&0x01)==0x00){/*Dev.mode&=0xfe;*/LockItem.stu&=0xfe;}						//20180326 add tail
;;;1857   					  else                {/*Dev.mode|=0x01;;*/LockItem.stu|=0x01;}
;;;1858   				}
;;;1859   				//添加指纹或删除指纹
;;;1860   				else if(type==0x02)
;;;1861   				{
;;;1862   						ps->buf[0]=0x05;			//帧控制
;;;1863   						ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;1864   						ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;1865   						ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;1866   						ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;1867   						ps->buf[5]=index;		//通道号
;;;1868   						if(dat==0xbb)
;;;1869   						{
;;;1870   									ps->buf[6]=3;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1871   									ps->buf[7]=dat;												  //键值
;;;1872   									ps->buf[8]=0x8e;
;;;1873   							    ps->buf[9]=0x00;
;;;1874   									ps->buf[10]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,10);		//CRC8校验
;;;1875   									ps->cnt=11;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1876   									lock.report=1;
;;;1877   						}
;;;1878   						else
;;;1879   						{
;;;1880   									ps->buf[6]=1;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1881   									ps->buf[7]=dat;												  //键值
;;;1882   									ps->buf[8]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,8);		//CRC8校验
;;;1883   									ps->cnt=9;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1884   									lock.report=1;
;;;1885   						}
;;;1886   				}
;;;1887   				//锁推送指令
;;;1888   				if(type==0x03)
;;;1889   				{
;;;1890   
;;;1891   #if 0				//不验证密码发送				
;;;1892   						ps->buf[0]=0x25;			//帧控制
;;;1893   						ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;1894   						ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;1895   						ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;1896   						ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;1897   						ps->buf[5]=0x10;//index;		//通道号	
;;;1898   						ps->buf[6]=0x01;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1899   						ps->buf[7]=dat;												  //键值
;;;1900   						ps->buf[8]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,8);		//CRC8校验
;;;1901   						ps->cnt=9;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1902   						lock.report=1;
;;;1903   #else       //验证密码发送
;;;1904   						ps->buf[0]=0x25;			//帧控制
;;;1905   						ps->buf[1]=(Master_Address>>8)&0x00ff;  //目标地址H
;;;1906   						ps->buf[2]=Master_Address;		//目标地址L
;;;1907   						ps->buf[3]=0x00;	
;;;1908   						ps->buf[4]=Dev.addr[0];
;;;1909   						ps->buf[5]=0x10;		//通道号	
;;;1910   						ps->buf[6]=9;                        	  //数据长度
;;;1911   						ps->buf[7]=dat;												  //键值
;;;1912   						for(i=0;i<8;i++)ps->buf[8+i]=lock.randkey[i];												//模式，这里默认为单击
;;;1913   						ps->buf[16]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,16);		//CRC8校验
;;;1914   						ps->cnt=17;					//发送总的字节数
;;;1915   						lock.report=1;
;;;1916   
;;;1917   #endif
;;;1918   				}
;;;1919   				else if(type==0x04)
;;;1920   				{
;;;1921   					
;;;1922   						ps->buf[0] =0x04;											//帧控制,从设备请求命令
;;;1923   						ps->buf[1] =0x00;
;;;1924   						ps->buf[2] =0x00;
;;;1925   						ps->buf[3] =Dev.serial++;							//帧序列号
;;;1926   						ps->buf[4] =Dev.addr[0];							//网络ID
;;;1927   						ps->buf[5] =0x10+index;											//设备总通道和当前通道
;;;1928   						ps->buf[6] =01;						      			//数据长度
;;;1929   				    ps->buf[7]=dat;	
;;;1930   						ps->buf[8]=Crc8CheckSum(ps->buf,8);		//CRC8校验
;;;1931   						ps->cnt=9;					                 	//发送总的字节数  
;;;1932   				}
;;;1933   				ps->flag=1;
;;;1934   				ps->resend=4;
;;;1935   				ps->rand=0;
;;;1936   				ps->ackwait=30;					//等待应答时间最大300mS
;;;1937   				EnQueueBuf(&RS485_Queue,index);

000190  7a00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#8]            ;1925  ; Dev
000192  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1925
000194  4912              LDR      r1,|L27.480|
000196  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]            ;1925
000198  4608              MOV      r0,r1                 ;1926
00019a  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]            ;1926  ; Dev
00019c  7120              STRB     r0,[r4,#4]            ;1926
00019e  f1080010          ADD      r0,r8,#0x10           ;1927
0001a2  7160              STRB     r0,[r4,#5]            ;1927
0001a4  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;1928
0001a6  71a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#6]            ;1928
0001a8  71e5              STRB     r5,[r4,#7]            ;1929
0001aa  2108              MOVS     r1,#8                 ;1930
0001ac  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;1930
0001ae  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
0001b2  7220              STRB     r0,[r4,#8]            ;1930
0001b4  2009              MOVS     r0,#9                 ;1931
0001b6  f88400c8          STRB     r0,[r4,#0xc8]         ;1931
                  |L27.442|
0001ba  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;1933
0001bc  f8040fc9          STRB     r0,[r4,#0xc9]!        ;1933
0001c0  2004              MOVS     r0,#4                 ;1934
0001c2  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;1934
0001c4  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;1935
0001c6  70e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#3]            ;1935

0001cc  f1a404c9          SUB      r4,r4,#0xc9           ;1936
0001d0  4641              MOV      r1,r8                 ;1937
0001d2  4802              LDR      r0,|L27.476|
0001d4  f7fffffe          BL       EnQueueBuf
0001d8  bf00              NOP      
0001da  e71c              B        |L27.22|
;;;1939   //============================================================================================================
                          ENDP

                  |L27.476|
                          DCD      RS485_Queue

                          AREA ||i.IT1_Modify_Addr_Old||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_Modify_Addr_Old PROC
;;;2391   //修改地址，老的方式
;;;2392   void IT1_Modify_Addr_Old(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;2393   {
;;;2394       if(RxDat.buf[3]==0xaa&&RxDat.buf[4]==0xaa&&RxDat.buf[5]==0xaa&&\
000002  4828              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
000004  7940              LDRB     r0,[r0,#5]
000006  28aa              CMP      r0,#0xaa
000008  d14b              BNE      |L28.162|
00000a  4826              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
00000c  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]
00000e  28aa              CMP      r0,#0xaa
000010  d147              BNE      |L28.162|
000012  4824              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
000014  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]
000016  28aa              CMP      r0,#0xaa
000018  d143              BNE      |L28.162|
;;;2395         RxDat.buf[6]==0xaa&&RxDat.buf[7]==0x00)
00001a  4822              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
00001c  7a00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#8]
00001e  28aa              CMP      r0,#0xaa
000020  d13f              BNE      |L28.162|
000022  4820              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
000024  7a40              LDRB     r0,[r0,#9]
000026  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000028  d13b              BNE      |L28.162|
;;;2396       { 		
;;;2397   					TxDat.buf[0] =0xCD;						//帧控制,从设备请求命令
00002a  20cd              MOVS     r0,#0xcd
00002c  491e              LDR      r1,|L28.168|
00002e  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;2398   					TxDat.buf[1] =0x00;						//目标地址
000030  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000032  481d              LDR      r0,|L28.168|
000034  7101              STRB     r1,[r0,#4]
;;;2399   					TxDat.buf[2] =0x0A;						//目标地址
000036  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
000038  7141              STRB     r1,[r0,#5]
;;;2400   					TxDat.buf[3] =0x03;						//帧序列号
00003a  2103              MOVS     r1,#3
00003c  7181              STRB     r1,[r0,#6]
;;;2401   					TxDat.buf[4] =0X00;						//设备总数以及设备子地址
00003e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000040  71c1              STRB     r1,[r0,#7]
;;;2402   					TxDat.buf[5] =0X00;						//网络ID，
000042  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;2403   					TxDat.buf[6] =0X00;						//数据个数  	
000044  7241              STRB     r1,[r0,#9]
;;;2404   					TxDat.buf[7] =RxDat.buf[7];				//数据个数 
000046  4817              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
000048  7a41              LDRB     r1,[r0,#9]
00004a  4817              LDR      r0,|L28.168|
00004c  7281              STRB     r1,[r0,#0xa]
;;;2405   					TxDat.buf[8] =RxDat.buf[8];				//数据个数 
00004e  4815              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
000050  7a81              LDRB     r1,[r0,#0xa]
000052  4815              LDR      r0,|L28.168|
000054  72c1              STRB     r1,[r0,#0xb]
;;;2406   					TxDat.buf[9] =Crc8CheckSum(TxDat.buf,9);	
000056  2109              MOVS     r1,#9
000058  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3
00005a  f7fffffe          BL       Crc8CheckSum
00005e  4912              LDR      r1,|L28.168|
000060  7308              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xc]
;;;2407   					RS485_Send(TxDat.buf,10);  
000062  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
000064  4810              LDR      r0,|L28.168|
000066  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3
000068  f7fffffe          BL       RS485_Send
;;;2408   					
;;;2409   			
;;;2410   					if((Dev.err&ERR_POWER)==0)										//电压正常才能写，低压禁止
00006c  480f              LDR      r0,|L28.172|
00006e  7b80              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0xe]  ; Dev
000070  f0100f10          TST      r0,#0x10
000074  d107              BNE      |L28.134|
;;;2411   					{
;;;2412   						    Dev.addr[0]=RxDat.buf[8];    
000076  480b              LDR      r0,|L28.164|
000078  7a80              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0xa]
00007a  490c              LDR      r1,|L28.172|
00007c  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;2413                   Write_Dev(Dev.addr[0],TYPE_EE_ADDR_ADDR0);							
00007e  7888              LDRB     r0,[r1,#2]  ; Dev
000080  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000082  f7fffffe          BL       Write_Dev
                  |L28.134|
;;;2414   					}
;;;2415   					
;;;2416   					InitQueueBUF(&RS485_Queue);					//清队列	
000086  480a              LDR      r0,|L28.176|
000088  f7fffffe          BL       InitQueueBUF
;;;2417             InitQueueBUF(&WirelessSend_Queue);					//清队列						
00008c  4809              LDR      r0,|L28.180|
00008e  f7fffffe          BL       InitQueueBUF
;;;2418   					Dev.stu=DEV_REGISTER;
000092  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000094  4905              LDR      r1,|L28.172|
000096  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;2419   					RegTimeClr(); 
000098  f7fffffe          BL       RegTimeClr
;;;2420   					TxDat.f_tx=1;
00009c  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00009e  4902              LDR      r1,|L28.168|
0000a0  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
                  |L28.162|
;;;2421   	   }
;;;2422   }
0000a2  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;2423   //============================================================================================================
                          ENDP

                  |L28.164|

                  IT1_Modify_Type PROC
;;;1487   // 08 00 FF 00 00 88 07 BB AA BB FF 72 20 08 F6 
;;;1488   uint8_t IT1_Modify_Type(void)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1489   {
;;;1490   	uint8_t t1,t2;
;;;1491   	uint16_t tt;
;;;1492   	//因为修改指令0x08在广播设地址时，不屏蔽
;;;1493   	if(RxDat.buf[2]!=Dev.addr[0])return 0;
000002  4816              LDR      r0,|L29.92|
000004  7900              LDRB     r0,[r0,#4]
000006  4916              LDR      r1,|L29.96|
000008  7889              LDRB     r1,[r1,#2]  ; Dev
00000a  4288              CMP      r0,r1
00000c  d001              BEQ      |L29.18|
00000e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L29.16|
;;;1494   
;;;1495   	t1=RxDat.buf[11];
;;;1496   	t2=RxDat.buf[12];
;;;1497   	tt=(uint16_t)(t1<<8)+(uint16_t)t2;
;;;1498   	//if((tt==0xb100)||(tt==0xb140))
;;;1499   	if((tt==0xb100)||(tt==0xb140)||((tt&0xf000)==0x3000))		//增加锁转发器支持
;;;1500   	{
;;;1501   			Write_Dev(t1,TYPE_EE_ADDR_TYPESH);
;;;1502   			Write_Dev(t2,TYPE_EE_ADDR_TYPES);
;;;1503   		  Dev.type=tt;
;;;1504   		  Dev.stu=DEV_REGISTER;
;;;1505   		  RegTimeClr(); 
;;;1506   			return 0;
;;;1507   	}
;;;1508   	else
;;;1509   	{
;;;1510   			return 1;
;;;1511   	}
;;;1512   
;;;1513   }
000010  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L29.18|
000012  4812              LDR      r0,|L29.92|
000014  7b45              LDRB     r5,[r0,#0xd]          ;1495
000016  7b86              LDRB     r6,[r0,#0xe]          ;1496
000018  eb062005          ADD      r0,r6,r5,LSL #8       ;1497
00001c  b284              UXTH     r4,r0                 ;1497
00001e  f5b44f31          CMP      r4,#0xb100            ;1499
000022  d008              BEQ      |L29.54|
000024  f5a44031          SUB      r0,r4,#0xb100         ;1499
000028  3840              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x40           ;1499
00002a  d004              BEQ      |L29.54|
00002c  f4044070          AND      r0,r4,#0xf000         ;1499
000030  f5b05f40          CMP      r0,#0x3000            ;1499
000034  d110              BNE      |L29.88|
                  |L29.54|
000036  2107              MOVS     r1,#7                 ;1501
000038  4628              MOV      r0,r5                 ;1501
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       Write_Dev
00003e  2106              MOVS     r1,#6                 ;1502
000040  4630              MOV      r0,r6                 ;1502
000042  f7fffffe          BL       Write_Dev
000046  4806              LDR      r0,|L29.96|

                  IT1_PROGRAM_Uadata PROC

                  |L30.60|

                          AREA ||i.IT1_ParseFrame||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_ParseFrame PROC
;;;179    //接收帧处理
;;;180    void IT1_ParseFrame(void)
000000  e92d41fc          PUSH     {r2-r8,lr}
;;;181    {
;;;182      unsigned char tmp1,tmp_addr;
;;;183    	//unsigned int temp_address;
;;;184    
;;;185    	unsigned char CheckSum/*,i*/;
;;;186    	unsigned int temp_address;
;;;187    	uint8_t buf[4];
;;;188    	
;;;189    	if(RxDat.cnt==0)return;
000004  4859              LDR      r0,|L31.364|
000006  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; RxDat
000008  b908              CBNZ     r0,|L31.14|
                  |L31.10|
;;;190    		
;;;191    	if(RxDat.buf[0]==0x02)return;	
;;;192    
;;;193    	temp_address=RxDat.buf[1];
;;;194    	temp_address=(temp_address<<8)+RxDat.buf[2];
;;;195    
;;;196    	tmp_addr=RxDat.buf[2];
;;;197    	
;;;198    	if(temp_address!=0xffff && tmp_addr!=Dev.addr[0])
;;;199      {
;;;200    			RxDat.cnt=0;						                        		//清接收数据个数
;;;201    			return;								                        			//跳出
;;;202    	}
;;;203    		
;;;204    	CheckSum=Crc8CheckSum(RxDat.buf,(RxDat.cnt-1));		    	//计算Crc8值
;;;205    	if(CheckSum==RxDat.buf[RxDat.cnt-1])				          	//判断Crc校验是否正确
;;;206    	{
;;;207    	  	
;;;208    	  if(Reg.fullflag==0)Led_set(0,12,12,1,1);
;;;209    		tmp1=RxDat.buf[0];
;;;210    		switch(tmp1)		
;;;211    		{
;;;212    			//============================================================================
;;;213    			case MSG_broadcast:					                        //广播地址不需要应答				
;;;214    				    IT1_Function_BroadCast();		
;;;215    			break;
;;;216    			//==============================================================================
;;;217          case MSG_command:					        	            		//命令报文
;;;218                IT1_Function_CMD();			
;;;219    			break;
;;;220    			//===============================================================================
;;;221    			case MSG_request:										    						//请求报文
;;;222    
;;;223    			break;
;;;224    			//================================================================================
;;;225    			case MSG_ask:					    					    						//应答报文
;;;226    						//此处没有用到
;;;227    			break;
;;;228    			//=================================================================================
;;;229    			case MSG_data:					    				        				//数据报文 
;;;230    			     	IT1_Function_Date();					            		//要转发的数据				
;;;231    			break;
;;;232    			//==================================================================================
;;;233    			case MSG_setup:											    						//设置报文	
;;;234    						IT1_Function_Setup(); 
;;;235    			break;
;;;236    			//==================================================================================
;;;237    			case MSG_modify:							                			//RS485地址设置		
;;;238    						IT1_Function_Modfiy();
;;;239    			break;
;;;240    			//==================================================================================
;;;241    			//20161226修改为支持红外数据下载
;;;242    			case 0x06:
;;;243    			     IT1_IR_Setup();
;;;244    			break;	
;;;245    			//===================================================================================
;;;246    			//红外配置数据删除
;;;247    			case 0x26:
;;;248    					IT1_IR_DEL();
;;;249    			break;
;;;250    			//==================================================================================
;;;251    			case 0x07:                      		//升级程序
;;;252    				    IT1_PROGRAM_Uadata();
;;;253    			break;
;;;254    						//==================================================================================
;;;255    			//上报产品信息和版本
;;;256    			case 0x20:
;;;257    						if((RxDat.buf[S_DATLEN]==0x01)&&(RxDat.buf[S_DAT]==0x00))
;;;258    						{
;;;259    								IT1_LoadInfo_Report();
;;;260    								IT1_Load_RS485_Ack(OPT_OK); 
;;;261    						}
;;;262    						else if(RxDat.buf[6]>0x01)
;;;263    						{
;;;264    								IT1_DevPara_Report(RxDat.buf[5],RxDat.buf[7],RxDat.buf[8]);
;;;265    								IT1_Load_RS485_Ack(OPT_OK); 
;;;266    							
;;;267    							  //=====================================
;;;268    							  //2017.05.12增加向遥控器请求红外配置指令
;;;269    							  buf[0]=0x03;
;;;270    							  buf[1]=Dev.rand;
;;;271    							  buf[2]=0x01;
;;;272    							  buf[3]=0x00;
;;;273    							  Wireless_Control_IR(0,3,&buf[0]);
;;;274    							  //======================================
;;;275    						}
;;;276    			break;
;;;277    			//===================================================================================
;;;278    			//复位，用于升级
;;;279    			case 0x22:
;;;280    						Dev.err|=ERR_RESET;
;;;281    						IT1_Load_RS485_Ack(OPT_OK);
;;;282    			break;
;;;283    			//===================================================================================
;;;284    			//参数设置
;;;285    			//23 00 xx 00 00 10 01 xx
;;;286    			case 0x23:			
;;;287    					  IT1_Load_RS485_Ack(OPT_ERR);
;;;288    			break;
;;;289    			
;;;290    			//===================================================================================
;;;291    			//????
;;;292    			//e0 00 b1 00 00 10 08 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 8f
;;;293    			//e0 00 b1 00 00 10 08 ff ff ff ff ff ff ff ff 61
;;;294    			case 0xe0:
;;;295    
;;;296    			break;
;;;297    			//===================================================================================
;;;298    			default:
;;;299    			     IT1_Load_RS485_Ack(OPT_ERR);  
;;;300    			break;
;;;301    			//====================================================================================
;;;302    		}
;;;303    
;;;304    	}
;;;305    	RxDat.cnt=0;	
;;;306    
;;;307    }
00000a  e8bd81fc          POP      {r2-r8,pc}
                  |L31.14|
00000e  4857              LDR      r0,|L31.364|
000010  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]            ;191  ; RxDat
000012  2802              CMP      r0,#2                 ;191
000014  d100              BNE      |L31.24|
000016  e7f8              B        |L31.10|
                  |L31.24|
000018  4854              LDR      r0,|L31.364|
00001a  78c7              LDRB     r7,[r0,#3]            ;193
00001c  7900              LDRB     r0,[r0,#4]            ;194
00001e  eb002707          ADD      r7,r0,r7,LSL #8       ;194
000022  4852              LDR      r0,|L31.364|
000024  7906              LDRB     r6,[r0,#4]            ;196
000026  f5a7407f          SUB      r0,r7,#0xff00         ;198
00002a  38ff              SUBS     r0,r0,#0xff           ;198
00002c  d007              BEQ      |L31.62|
00002e  4850              LDR      r0,|L31.368|
000030  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]            ;198  ; Dev
000032  42b0              CMP      r0,r6                 ;198
000034  d003              BEQ      |L31.62|
000036  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;200
000038  494c              LDR      r1,|L31.364|
00003a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]            ;200
00003c  e7e5              B        |L31.10|
                  |L31.62|
00003e  484b              LDR      r0,|L31.364|
000040  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]            ;204  ; RxDat
000042  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;204

000050  4846              LDR      r0,|L31.364|

000054  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;205
000056  4945              LDR      r1,|L31.364|

00005e  d175              BNE      |L31.332|

                          AREA ||i.IT1_PraseASK||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  IT1_PraseASK PROC
;;;561    //应答帧处理
;;;562    unsigned char IT1_PraseASK(void)
000000  b538              PUSH     {r3-r5,lr}
;;;563    {
;;;564      	unsigned short int tempdata;
;;;565      	//unsigned char tmp;
;;;566    	if(RxDat.cnt>=4)
000002  4820              LDR      r0,|L32.132|
000004  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; RxDat
000006  2804              CMP      r0,#4
000008  db39              BLT      |L32.126|
;;;567    	{
;;;568    		//=========================================================================================		
;;;569    		if(RxDat.buf[0]==MSG_ask)	        //如果是应答包
00000a  481e              LDR      r0,|L32.132|
00000c  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]  ; RxDat
00000e  2803              CMP      r0,#3
000010  d135              BNE      |L32.126|
;;;570    		{
;;;571    		  	//tempdata=RxDat.buf[1];
;;;572    				//tempdata=(tempdata<<8)+RxDat.buf[2];
;;;573    				tempdata=RxDat.buf[2];
000012  481c              LDR      r0,|L32.132|
000014  7904              LDRB     r4,[r0,#4]
;;;574    			//========================================================================================
;;;575    			//判断是否是设备本身地址，或者虚拟设备地址
;;;576    		  if(tempdata==Dev.addr[0])
000016  481c              LDR      r0,|L32.136|
000018  7880              LDRB     r0,[r0,#2]  ; Dev
00001a  42a0              CMP      r0,r4
00001c  d12f              BNE      |L32.126|
;;;577    			{
;;;578    				if(Dev.stu<DEV_NORMAL)
00001e  481a              LDR      r0,|L32.136|
000020  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; Dev
000022  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000024  da29              BGE      |L32.122|
;;;579    				{
;;;580    						if(RxDat.buf[S_DATLEN]==0X01)
000026  4817              LDR      r0,|L32.132|
000028  7a00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#8]
00002a  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00002c  d11a              BNE      |L32.100|
;;;581    						{
;;;582    									if(RxDat.buf[S_DAT]==0xf2)
00002e  4815              LDR      r0,|L32.132|
000030  7a40              LDRB     r0,[r0,#9]
000032  28f2              CMP      r0,#0xf2
000034  d10b              BNE      |L32.78|
;;;583    									{
;;;584    												Reg.fullflag=1;
000036  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000038  4914              LDR      r1,|L32.140|
00003a  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;585    										    Led_set(0,25,25,0xff,1);
00003c  23ff              MOVS     r3,#0xff
00003e  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
000040  4611              MOV      r1,r2
000042  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000044  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000046  f7fffffe          BL       Led_set
;;;586    												return 0;
00004a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L32.76|
;;;587    									}
;;;588    									else if(RxDat.buf[S_DAT]==0x00)
;;;589    									{
;;;590    												Dev.stu=DEV_NORMAL;
;;;591    												InitQueueBUF(&RS485_Queue);
;;;592    												return 1;
;;;593    									}
;;;594    						}
;;;595    						else if(RxDat.buf[S_DATLEN]==0X00)
;;;596    						{
;;;597    									Dev.stu=DEV_NORMAL;
;;;598    									InitQueueBUF(&RS485_Queue);
;;;599    									return 1;
;;;600    						}
;;;601    				}
;;;602    				else
;;;603    				{
;;;604    						return 1;
;;;605    				}
;;;606    			}
;;;607    		}
;;;608    	}
;;;609    	return 0;
;;;610    }
00004c  bd38              POP      {r3-r5,pc}
                  |L32.78|
00004e  480d              LDR      r0,|L32.132|
000050  7a40              LDRB     r0,[r0,#9]            ;588
000052  b9a0              CBNZ     r0,|L32.126|
000054  2002              MOVS     r0,#2                 ;590
000056  490c              LDR      r1,|L32.136|
000058  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]            ;590
00005a  480d              LDR      r0,|L32.144|
00005c  f7fffffe          BL       InitQueueBUF
000060  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;592
000062  e7f3              B        |L32.76|
                  |L32.100|
000064  4807              LDR      r0,|L32.132|
000066  7a00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#8]            ;595
000068  b948              CBNZ     r0,|L32.126|
00006a  2002              MOVS     r0,#2                 ;597
00006c  4906              LDR      r1,|L32.136|
00006e  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]            ;597
000070  4807              LDR      r0,|L32.144|
000072  f7fffffe          BL       InitQueueBUF
000076  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;599
000078  e7e8              B        |L32.76|
                  |L32.122|
00007a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;604
00007c  e7e6              B        |L32.76|
                  |L32.126|
00007e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;609
000080  e7e4              B        |L32.76|
;;;611    
                          ENDP

000082  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L32.132|

                  |L32.136|
